A :üì£üò¨ Yes
Q : It means that the person who shares (not the purchaser) set C will have no privileges, right??
A :üì£üò¨ Yes
Q : Will the purchasers receive the privilege automatically, or do they have to register again with their passports?
A : üì£üò¨ Yes, the purchaser will receive the privilege automatically.
For the Passport Activity, you must bring a passport participating in the stamp activity with 6 designated stamps completely affixed in the ancient city to register at the registration point. The number of passports participating in the activity is not limited to 1 name.
Q : How long will the Fan Meet U event take?
A : üì£üò¨ About 2 hours. The detailed schedule will be announced again before the event.
Q : No matter what set I buy, including set A, set B, or set C, I will get a random fan meet-up and hi-bye, right? Regarding the 50 rights, do I have to do the activity using a passport??
